headline: Global Payments Launches Genius™ Solution for Higher Education Institutions
summary: ATLANTA, October 06, 2025--Global Payments Inc. (NYSE: GPN), a leading worldwide provider of payment technology and software solutions, today announced a Genius offering for higher education institutions in the U.S. and Canada. This unified POS solution is ideally suited for a range of campus use cases, including on-campus merchants, dining halls, recreational facilities, departments and clubs, stadiums, and more.
